mapper.sql: id, org_id, version, calc_date, dq_hiatus, dq_ratio, dq_electric, dq_pay, cdq_hiatus, cdq_ratio, cdq_electric, cdq_pay, create_time, update_time, day_assess_electric
mapper.select: select wad.id, wad.calc_date calcDate, wad.dq_hiatus dqHiatus, wad.dq_ratio dqRatio, wad.dq_electric dqElectric, wad.dq_pay dqPay, wad.cdq_hiatus cdqHiatus, wad.cdq_ratio cdqRatio, wad.cdq_electric cdqElectric, wad.cdq_pay cdqPay, wac.dq_hiatus dqHiatusFnl, wac.dq_ratio dqRatioFnl, wac.dq_electric dqElectricFnl, wac.dq_pay dqPayFnl, wac.cdq_hiatus cdqHiatusFnl, wac.cdq_ratio cdqRatioFnl, wac.cdq_electric cdqElectricFnl, wac.cdq_pay cdqPayFnl, wac.exec_person execPerson, wac.guardian guardian, wac.fix_reason fixReason, wac.fix_time fixTime from wf_assess_day wad left join wf_assess_change wac on wad.id = wac.day_ref_id and wac.newest = 0 where wad.calc_date >= #{mPre} and wad.calc_date < #{mPost}
